vendor_name: Hilton Moorea Lagoon Resort and Spa
title: Tahitian Private Pool Luxury
description: Experience the dreamy lagoons and palm-fringed beaches of Moorea Island (30 min. by ferry from Tahiti mainland) with six nights of private pool villa or overwater villa luxury at Hilton Moorea Lagoon Resort & Spa. Includes return airport or ferry port transfers, daily buffet breakfasts, delicious dining experiences, cocktails, a massage, an early check-in and late checkout, complimentary Wi-Fi and more.
